1587380.name: Little Ghost
1587380.description:
In this 2D puzzle-platforming metroidvania, play as Little Ghost, navigating an inch-high little lady through an interconnected collage landscape. Interact with scattered office supplies and unique characters, collect media and art, traverse a vast map of perilous office furniture and décor.

Full game release Fall 2026 || Our 2022 Kickstarter Demo is still available for the enthused. More than a sneak peek, you can access 2-3hours worth of early game play today!

Game Features

  • Discover the scattered world of a wind blown office space; a peculiar sketchbook, grand bookshelf, and labyrinthine computer stretch out before you as you uncover truths and recover lost memories

  • Utilize retro-inspired platforming, including familiar move sets such as grappling hook and super-dash, and introducing a unique ~float~ mechanic, in lieu of combat

  • Unveil the secrets of Prime Products Division, the mysterious corporation manufacturing the abundance of goods and resources you know and trust

  • Meet animated physical and digital characters come to life as you navigate the gorgeous, the strange, the absurd, and the uncanny

  • Acquaint yourself with eclectic practitioners of the occult who direct or distract from your quest, granting power-ups and challenging your knowledge and perception

  • Gain enemies-turned-allies as new playable characters

  • Collect mixed media along the way to set your own in-game vibes, including a large library of musical tracks and podcasts, all organized on a Tamagachi-like interface

  • Shuffle the deck of chance and destiny as you gather and glean tarot card wisdom and insights

  • Experience a breathtaking, single-contiguous collage full of secret hidden spaces within a non-linear, unlockable map

Streamers have our permission to broadcast the Little Ghost music & podcasts on their streams and playthrus.
